file_content.text: Welcome, Major. We appreciate you taking the time to come and respond to our concerns in person. Senator Zian, you may proceed.
Thank you. As many of you are aware, Havoc Squad is widely considered to be the finest infantry team in the Republic military.
Their reputation earns them a great deal of leeway--so much that they have become a danger to the Republic itself.
My friends and colleagues--what is it that Havoc Squad actually does, day in and day out? Disturbingly, almost no one knows for sure.
[Say nothing]
My squad and I put our lives on the line to defend the Republic!
We fight the Empire!
I must direct you to reserve any comments until the appropriate time, Major. Please continue, Senator Zian.
Look at the previous commander of Havoc Squad. His treason would have been impossible if the squad were more closely supervised.
We all remember the mysterious disappearance of Havoc Squad's previous commander. No doubt a crime was committed and covered up.
And that nonsense with the so-called "Gauntlet superweapon." An astronomically expensive operation to destroy a science project whose danger was never substantially proven!
And it was only after that reckless operation that the Empire attacked us with full force. Why wasn't the Senate consulted beforehand?
[Say nothing]
Are you really trying to put this entire conflict on our shoulders?
You're blaming the war on us?
Major, you've already been warned. Do not speak out of turn again.
It isn't your turn to speak, Major. Please remain quiet until Senator Zian has completed his statement.
I will end with this simple fact: Since the war broke out, Havoc Squad hasn't made a single trip to the front lines.
If all of the Republic's battles are being won and lost without the help of our best team, then it's time we made changes.
Thank you, Senator Zian. Major, if you'd like to make a response, you may begin now.
My team is not a threat to the Republic--but traitors like Zian are.
Havoc Squad serves faithfully.
The Senator speaks very persuasively, but not truthfully.
Zian isn't what he seems.
I have evidence here proving that Senator Zian is a paid agent for the Sith Empire.
Senator Zian is a lying traitor, and I have proof!
This is all a sham!
Here, rock-solid evidence that Zian is taking bribes from Imperial agents.
Zian is only doing this because the Imps paid him off. I have proof.
Ignore this traitor!
This is outrageous! Are we really going to tolerate wild accusations like this?
The commander of Havoc Squad deserves more than to be dismissed out of hand.
Treason is a very serious accusation. I would like to hear more before passing judgment.
Preposterous. I called this hearing to present facts, not paranoid delusions.
The facts are right here. Give it up.
It's over, Zian.
Though it is highly irregular, these are dangerous times. We are in no place to ignore accusations of treason, even among our own body.
The Imps paid you to shut us down--that's what this is about.
You just want Havoc removed.
Talk again and you'll regret it, Zian.
Enough lies!
Please, let's all remain calm. I see no reason we couldn't delay these proceedings momentarily to evaluate this new evidence.
Guards--seal the area and allow no one to leave until we are prepared to reconvene.
Senator Zian. In light of this evidence, I must order that you be detained by the Senate Guard pending charges for high treason.
But, this is insane! I'm no traitor! Whatever you've seen, it must be a forgery--some kind of military conspiracy!
Please accept our apologies, Major. I hope you understand that you were called here with the best of intentions.
You have a duty to ensure that we're acting in the Republic's best interest.
Of course.
That's right. And rest assured that your tireless efforts in the Republic's defense are greatly appreciated.
If you'll excuse me, then, I need to return to duty immediately.
May I go now?
Of course. I see no further issues for discussion.
You didn't take the Imps' money, but you still did what they wanted.
Save it.
The people of the Republic entrust you with their defense. We have a responsibility to supervise your actions on their behalf.
Further discussion is unnecessary. Let's get on with other business.
Given the change in circumstances brought about by new evidence, I hereby adjourn this meeting immediately. Major, you're dismissed.
You want to know what Havoc Squad does? We kill traitors.
Let me show you. [Kill Zian]
Wh--what are you doing? No, no, you can't. You can't!
He... he's dead. He's dead! You've killed him!
Zian was working for the enemy. Here's the proof.
I've executed a traitor.
I don't debate the enemy in the field, and I won't do it here.
Killing is my job.
Zian was a traitor--this proves it.
So you shot him? What's wrong with you?
Were you working with him? Did the Imps pay you like they paid Zian?
You have a problem with it?
What? What are you talking about? Have you lost your mind?
By what right have you done this, Major? By what right have you killed an unarmed man in the capitol of the Republic?
I took an oath to destroy the enemies of the Republic.
I was doing my duty.
Yes, on the battlefield. This is not a battlefield.
Killing the enemy somewhere else is fine, but here, it's a problem?
Why is this different?
This is a place of democracy, of lawful procedures--not bloodshed.
Leave us, Major. Go back to the war where you belong--we have a lot to discuss.
I did what needed to be done. I'm leaving.
Don't get in my way.
What? You can't just leave--you've killed a Republic Senator in cold blood! Guards!
Hold your posts, men. Enough damage has been done here today.
